name: interest
description:
A city frozen in time, a meteor free to explore.

In interest you play as a sphere. It can move really fast. It can pass through solid matter. 

Why am I a sphere? Why is the sky so bleak? Where is everybody?  These are questions only you can answer after playing interest.

This is the first interactive experience I made as I learned C#. As such there aren't any extrinsic expectations or goals for the player. I was inspired by the art of Dima Goryainov's entry for My Famicase Exhitbition 2017 and the bleak feeling it gave me as I observed the cartridge art. I hope you enjoy it.

P.S.

The sphere will bug out a bit if you look directly up or directly down. If that happens, don't panic. Just slowly adjust the camera in the opposite direction and it'll re-adjust.
